a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Consumption-based vs. production-based CO₂ emissions per capita, 2019
Consumption-based versus production-based carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions per capita, measured in tonnes per
person. Production-based emissions are national emissions produced within a country's boundaries.
Consumption-based emissions are adjusted for emissions embedded in trade (i.e. territorial emissions minus
Source: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project and UN Population
